articles.description: Director Spike Jonze and old pals Mike D and Ad-Rock get together to tell the narrative of the hip-hop group in an Apple TV+ doc that's really more of a filmed stage play.
articles.content: The late, great monologist Spalding Gray used to sit on the stage, usually at a desk, often with a binder in front of him, and tell stories. The minimalist one-man shows weren't inherently cinematic, but when they were adapted for the big screen, they attract… [+5909 chars]
